secinitd(8) System Manager's Manual secinitd(8)

NAME

secinitd —
The security policy initialization daemon.

DESCRIPTION

secinitd secinitd is a system daemon that initializes the runtime security policies for processes. It is not intended to be invoked directly.

SEE ALSO

launchd(8) launchd.conf(5)
